name: Sonia
subtitle: The Blue Hurricane
description: A genius who was acknowledged by the Tower of Sages, while not being part of it. She was given the title of 'Blue', but her true identity is that of a homunculus. Her orbs of lightning do not even leave ash in their wake.
story: A combat homunculus created by a wizard in Orvel, who used the heart of Vikal the Lightning Beast as her core. After gaining self-awareness in the creation process, she fled the laboratory and spent the next few years at Ricardo's orphanage. She is capable of casting powerful lightning magic at will. As a combat homunculus, she boasts excellent physical abilities as well. Beneath her appearance as a young girl, she is a confused war machine searching for the meaning of her existence. The wizards of the Tower of Sage bestowed her the title of 'Blue' to indicate her mastery over chant-less spell casting. However, she distrusts wizards and has no desire to associate herself with the Tower.
like: Mirianne, and everyone at the orphanage

inn.idle: There are a lot of people, huh...Mirianne, where are you?

talk: I'm only good at fighting, really. Don't expect too much from me.
Even if I'm not human, don't take me lightly.
Stop staring, before I shock you real good.
If you want to spar, let me know. Of course, it'll hurt a lot! You might get electrocuted!

relationship.greet: Eh, you want to talk to me? You're weird...
talk: You're curious about me? Well...I did tell you I'm a homunculus.
Fighting style? Ah, I use the Core of Electricity inside my body to...
Friends and family? Oh...um, Ricardo, Mirianne...and maybe...you?

uw.story: A sphere of electricity created by Sonia based on the beast core that is now her own heart. She has shown great talent in making magic gear, and this is the first weapon she ever created. It's a bit lacking in stability, mostly due to the overwhelming electricity it contains. The powerful electrical storm created by this weapon is truly dangerous for any enemy. In fact, anyone besides Sonia who touches it would be instantly fried by the immense current that flows through it.

ut.story: A jewel that the Tower of Sage bestowed upon Sonia with the title of Blue. It has a special function of condensing and amplifying Sonia's lightning energy. The sages in the tower gave her the jewel, hoping that she would stay. However, she left the tower anyway, repulsed by the existence of wizards. She left the jewel in the tower, but at some point during her journey, she realized that it somehow ended up in her pocket.

ut.story: A cloak that Mirianne made for Sonia by braving a danger. There was a time when Sonia's clothes would burn from the explosion of the electricity that ran through her body. Mirianne saw that and plucked out the ereth plant that is said to grow by being struck by lightning. She pulled out its thread and completed a cloak with it. Sonia saw Mirianne's blistered hands from the electricity, and she cried in silence for a long time. A piece of clothing just for Sonia that can't be found anywhere else.

ut.story: Heart of Vikal, who is called a holy beast. He eats the elements of light and dark from the world, so his heart is full of thunder from the collision between the two elements. If someone unskilled were to touch it, he would be absorbed by its power. But Sonia, who is made up of the core of lightning, absorbed that power and obtained mana that is beyond imaginable.
